channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-4392|2024-08-04T19:33:37.900Z -- ibm%20corporation -- hcl%20appscan%20standard%20edition
item.description: HCL AppScan Standard Edition 9.0.3.13 and earlier uses hard-coded credentials which can be exploited by attackers to get unauthorized access to the system.

item.title: CVE-2019-4301|2024-08-04T19:33:38.110Z -- ibm%20corporation -- hcl%20bigfix%20self-service%20application%20%28ssa%29
item.description: BigFix Self-Service Application (SSA) is vulnerable to arbitrary code execution if Javascript code is included in Running Message or Post Message HTML.
